name: BACKRUN
description:
Meanwhile this time, outside your ***king ass..

Adventurers are looking for the key to save the world... blablabla.... amazing story....blablabla.... an insane gameplay.... blablabla.... you are breathtaking.

Well, I could tell you the story I want to tell, but this is the kind of narrative experience that could help you to escape the daily shit of life. Initially, I wanted to write a book. But my keyboard is freezing so I made a game on Unity.

The characters are still Work in Progress, the world is little and enemies are glitching. But what a pleasure to make it !

I'll make it grow a way you can't imagine.
